pkgmetadata.longdescription: Improving MrP with Ensemble Learning // A tool that improves the prediction performance of multilevel regression with post- stratification (MrP) by combining a number of machine learning methods. For information on the method, please refer to Broniecki, West, Leemann (2020) ''Improving Multilevel Regression with Post-Stratification Through Machine Learning (autoMrP)'' in the 'Journal of Politics'. Final pre-print version: https://lucasleemann.files.wordpress.com/2020/07/autom rp-r2pa.pdf.
